p: The age of the cases varied from 2 years to 74 years and maximum number of cases ranged below 29 years. The younger age groups (10â€“29 years) were most commonly affected. More adults in comparison to children were affected due to HEV and more children in comparison to adults were affected due to HAV. Similar findings were reported from Chhattisgarh,[ 6] Kerala,[ 21] Andhra Pradesh[ 22] Gujarat,[ 16 23] Punjab,[ 17 18] and north western India.[ 24]
